## Details required for Chapter 3

Here will be the introduction to `Stata`. Now an example of code visualization:

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(Statamarkdown)
```

```{stata eval = F, echo = 1:5}
clear all
set obs 10000
gen x = -3 + 6/(_N-1)*(_n - 1)
gen y = normalden(x)
line y x
quietly graph export "NormalDensity.png", replace
```

![Normal Density](NormalDensity.png)
